situation:
CE Board May 2010
A W250x90kg/m girder with a simple span of 8 meters carries equal concentrated dead loads, P, at each quarter point in addition to a uniform dead load of 5kN/m and a live load of 7.2kN/m including the dead weight.
Properties
A=11500mm²
d=350mm
bf=250mm
tf=16mm
tw=10mm
Ix=266x10⁶mm⁴
Iy=45x10⁶mm⁴
Fy=248MPa
E=200GPa.

subquestions.question: Determine P based on flexure if Fb is limited to 0.66Fy.
Determine P based on shear if Fv is limited to 0.4Fy.
Determine the additional live load based on deflection if the maximum deflection is L/360 for the camber to offset the dead load.
